mapper.insert: INSERT INTO music_info (mu_name, mu_ai_seq, mu_lyrics, mu_ab_seq, mu_img_file, mu_music_file,mu_playtime, mu_explain_txt, mu_age, mu_reg_dt, mu_gr_seq, mu_cr_seq, mu_is_confirm) VALUES (#{mu_name}, #{mu_ai_seq}, #{mu_lyrics}, #{mu_ab_seq}, #{mu_img_file}, #{mu_music_file},#{mu_playtime}, #{mu_explain_txt}, #{mu_age},now(), #{mu_gr_seq}, #{mu_cr_seq}, #{mu_is_confirm})
